metadata.description: Research-backed retail psychology data with citations

sources.title: Eye level is buy level: The importance of in-store product placement

eye_level.description: Optimal visibility zone where shoppers naturally look first

above_eye_level.description: Requires upward gaze; suitable for attention-grabbing products

below_eye_level.description: 25% sales drop compared to eye level; requires downward gaze

bottom_shelf.description: Lowest visibility; typically 35% lower sales than eye level

checkout.description: Highest traffic area with high impulse purchase rate

main_entrance.description: First touchpoint; sets shopping experience tone

center_aisle.description: Baseline traffic for standard aisle locations
